description: The SportsInJSON Soccer schema contains properties common to Baseball.

baseballEventMetadata.description: Metadata about the event itself. | Includes what state the game is in.

baseballTeamMetadata.description: Metadata about the team. | Specific to the sport of baseball.

probableStartingPitcherIdref.description: ID of the pitcher who will probably start the game.

baseballPlayerMetadata.description: Metadata about the player. | Specific to the sport of baseball.

battingHand.description: Indicates whether player bats left, right, or is a switch-hitter.

throwingHand.description: Indicates whether player throws left, right, or is a switch-thrower.

baseballPlayerStats.description: Stats collected by a player. | Includes offensive, pitching, and defensive stats.

baseballTeamStats.description: Specific statistics for baseball. | Includes offensive, pitching, and defensive stats.

baseBaseballStats.description: Specific statistics for baseball. | Includes offensive, pitching, and defensive stats.

baseballStatsOffensive.description: Stats accumulated while a team is at bat. | Includes hits and runs.

average.description: Average number of hits per at-bats

atBats.description: Number of at-bats (Does not include walks or Sacrifice Hits)

totalBases.description: Calculated by hits + doubles + (triples times 2) + (home-runs times 3).

basesOnBalls.description: Number of times batter was walked

strikeoutsAgainst.description: Number of times batter struck out

leftOnBase.description: Number of runners left on base

leftInScoringPosition.description: Number of runners left on second and/or third base

singles.description: Number of hits off of which batter advances to first base

doubles.description: Number of hits off of which batter advances to second base

triples.description: Number of hits off of which batter advances to third base

homeRuns.description: Number of hits off of which batter advances to home plate

grandSlams.description: Number of home runs with bases loaded

plateAppearancesPerHomeRun.description: Plate appearances per home run ratio

sacFlies.description: Number of hits resulting in batter out which advance base runner(s)

sacBunts.description: Number of bunts resulting in batter out which advance base runner(s)

groundedIntoDoublePlay.description: Number of ground balls which result in batter and base runner outs

movedUp.description: Number of times runner advances to another base

onBasePercentage.description: Calculated as follows: (hits + bases-on-balls + hit-by-pitch) / (at-bats + bases-on-balls + hit-by-pitch + sac-flies)

stolenBasesCaught.description: Number of times the runner was caught while trying to steal bases.

hitByPitch.description: Number of times batter hit by pitch

reachedBaseDefensiveInterference.description: The number of times the player reached a base due to interference by the defense.

onBasePlusSlugging.description: Calculated by adding on-base-percentage to slugging-percentage.

plateAppearances.description: Calculated by adding at-bats, bases-on-balls, hit-by-pitch, sac-flies, sac-bunts, and defensive-interfance-reaches.

hitsExtraBase.description: Calculated by adding doubles, triples, and home-runs.

baseballStatsPitching.description: Stats accumulated while a team is pitching. | Includes strikeouts and shutouts.

interferences.description: Number of interference or obstruction calls

era.description: Earned run average: Number of earned runs divided by number of innings pitched multiplied by nine

inheritedRunnersScored.description: Number of runners which a previous pitcher allowed on base which scored

pickOffs.description: The number of times the pitcher caught a player trying to steal, before making the pitch.

errorsHitWithPitch.description: Number of times pitcher hits batter with pitch

wins.description: Number of games pitcher has won

losses.description: Number of games pitcher has lost

saves.description: Number of games pitcher has saved

holds.description: Number of games relief pitcher has held the lead

reliefPoints.description: Formula for rating relief performances. 4 points for a tough save; 3 points for a save; 2 for a relief win; minus 2 for a relief loss and blown save.

shutouts.description: Number of games pitched in which opposing team did not score

gamesFinished.description: Number of games pitched to the end

winningPercentage.description: Calculated by wins divided by (wins + losses).

eventCredit.description: Whether a pitcher has received credit for winning or losing the game. TBD. Controlled Vocabulary. (win|loss|save|blown-save|win-blown-save|loss-blown-save|hold-win|hold-loss)

saveCredit.description: Whether a pitcher has received credit for winning or losing the game. TBD. Controlled Vocabulary. (win|loss|save|blown-save|win-blown-save|loss-blown-save|hold-win|hold-loss)

battersAtBatsAgainst.description: Number of batters faced who were credited with at-bats.

baseballStatsDefensive.description: Stats accumulated while a team is out in the field. | Includes double-plays and errors.

doublePlays.description: Number of times two runners thrown out at the base.

triplePlays.description: Number of times three runners thrown out at the base.

putouts.description: Number of times a fielder caught a fly ball for an out.

assists.description: Number of plays in which a fielder throws a ball to another fielder for the out.

errors.description: Number of plays in which a fielder committed an error, such as dropping a ball.

fieldingPercentage.description: A measure of fielding success. Calculated as follows: (putouts + assists) / (putouts + assists + errors).

defensiveAverage.description: Rate a fielder turns a bill hit to their area into an out.

errorsPassedBall.description: Number of times a catcher is faulted with letting a pitched ball go past.

errorsCatchersInterference.description: Number of times a catcher has improperly interfered with play.

stolenBasesAgainst.description: Number of bases successfully stolen while this player was on the field.

stolenBasesCaughtDefense.description: Number of times a runner was caught while trying to steal bases while this player was on the field.

stolenBasesAverageDefense.description: Success rate for stealing bases while this player was on the field.

inningsPlayed.description: Number of innings played at the named position.

gamesPlayedPosition.description: Number of games played at the named position.

inningValue.description: An integer. 1 through 9 for the main innings. 10, 11, 12, etc. for extra innings.

runnerOnFirst.description: Whether or not a player is standing on first base. Either true or false.

runnerOnFirstIdref.description: A pointer to the player on first base.

runnerOnSecond.description: Whether or not a player is standing on second base. Either true or false.

runnerOnSecondIdref.description: A pointer to the player on second base.

runnerOnThird.description: Whether or not a player is standing on third base. Either true or false.

runnerOnThirdIdref.description: A pointer to the player on third base.

pitcherIdref.description: A pointer to the player element for the pitcher standing on the mound.

batterIdref.description: A pointer to the player element for the batter at the plate.

batterSide.description: Which side of the plate the batter was on when taking the pitch.

atBatNumber.description: Incremented throughout game on a per-team basis. A perfect game would have at-bat-number go from 1 to 27 for the team that didn't get any hits.
